== System Configuration & Utilities ==

=== Software update ===
Regular software updates can be retrieved from online repositories automatically. The user can then determine which updates they would like to apply from a familiar update manager interface.

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config-update| Software Update Test Cases]]</nowiki>

=== Power Management ===
Adjust power saving settings for disk, and standby/sleep. 

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config-power| Power Management Test Cases]]</nowiki>

=== Network Manager ===
Select from available network resources, manage wireless keys, and view network status

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config-network| Network Manager Test Cases]]</nowiki>

=== Touchscreen ===

Recalibrate screen position so screen tap location and screen display match more closely

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config-touchscreen| Touchscreen Test Cases]]</nowiki>

=== Screen brightness ===

Adjust the screen backlight level

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config-brightness| Screen Brightness Test Cases]]</nowiki>

=== User theme customization ===

Manage existing themes, customise, and download new themes to be applied to the desktop

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config-themes| User Theme Test Cases]]</nowiki>

=== Screen size/Resolution ===
Adjust screen resolution to fit your device

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config-resolution| Screen Size and Resolution Test Cases]]</nowiki>

=== Hardware button configuration ===

Assign various actions to the hardware buttons on the MID device such as calendar, browser, and camera.

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config-hardware| Hardware Button Test Cases]]</nowiki>

=== Volume Controls ===

Adjust system volume

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config-volume| Volume Controls Test Cases]]</nowiki>

=== Sound ===

* Sound Events
* Music and Movies
* Audio Conferencing

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config-sound| Sound Test Cases]]</nowiki>

=== System Information ===

Provides OS version, hardware usage, and status

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config-system| System Info Test Cases]]</nowiki>

=== Date & Time settings ===

Adjust date and time settings for system

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config-date| Date & Time Test Cases]]</nowiki>

=== Accelerometer ===

Accelerometer adjusts screen orientation in relation to viewing angle

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config-accel | Accelerometer Test Cases]]</nowiki>

=== Card Reader ===

Card reader supports major flash memory brands and formats

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config-cardreader | Card Reader Test Cases]]</nowiki>

=== Peripherals ===
Check ability to connect/use peripherals.

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-config-periph| Peripheral Test Cases]]</nowiki>
